title: STAT+: Meta is urged by state attorneys general to boost enforcement of weight loss drug advertising
description: More than three dozen state AGs are urging Meta to better enforce its policies to thwart a “surge of misleading” ads for weight loss drugs on Instagram and Facebook.
content: More than three dozen state AGs are urging Meta to better enforce its policies to thwart a “surge of misleading” ads for weight loss drugs on Instagram and Facebook.
